title: Seo competitor analysis & data logging with Semrush API and Google Sheets
description:
### Competitor Analysis & SEO Data Logging Workflow Using [Competitor Analysis Semrush API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/competitor-analysis-semrush)

## Description  
This workflow automates SEO competitor analysis using the **[Competitor Analysis Semrush API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/competitor-analysis-semrush)** and logs the data into **Google Sheets** for structured reporting.  
It captures domain overview, organic competitors, organic pages, and keyword-level insights from the **[Competitor Analysis Semrush API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/competitor-analysis-semrush)**, then appends them to different sheets for easy tracking.

---

## Node-by-Node Explanation

1. **On form submission** ‚Äì Captures the website URL entered by the user.  
2. **Competitor Analysis** ‚Äì Sends the website to the **[Competitor Analysis Semrush API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/competitor-analysis-semrush)** via HTTP POST request.  
3. **Re format output** ‚Äì Extracts and formats the domain overview data.  
4. **Domain overview** ‚Äì Saves organic keywords and traffic into Google Sheets.  
5. **Reformat** ‚Äì Extracts the organic competitors list.  
6. **Organic Competitor** ‚Äì Logs competitor domains, relevance, and traffic into Google Sheets.  
7. **Reformat 2** ‚Äì Extracts organic pages data.  
8. **Organic Pages** ‚Äì Stores page-level data such as traffic and keyword counts.  
9. **Reformat2** ‚Äì Extracts organic keywords details.  
10. **organic keywords** ‚Äì Logs keyword data like CPC, volume, and difficulty into Google Sheets.  

---

## Benefits  

- ‚úÖ **Automated competitor tracking** ‚Äì No manual API calls, all logged in Google Sheets.  
- ‚úÖ **Centralized SEO reporting** ‚Äì Data stored in structured sheets for quick access.  
- ‚úÖ **Time-saving** ‚Äì Streamlines research by combining multiple reports in one workflow.  
- ‚úÖ **Accurate insights** ‚Äì Direct data from the **[Competitor Analysis Semrush API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/competitor-analysis-semrush)** ensures reliability.  

---

## Use Cases  

- üìä **SEO Research** ‚Äì Track domain performance and competitor strategies.  
- üîç **Competitor Monitoring** ‚Äì Identify competitor domains, keywords, and traffic.  
- üìù **Content Strategy** ‚Äì Find top-performing organic pages and replicate content ideas.  
- üí∞ **Keyword Planning** ‚Äì Use CPC and difficulty data to prioritize profitable keywords.  
- üìà **Client Reporting** ‚Äì Generate ready-to-use SEO competitor analysis reports in Google Sheets.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
